articleCreation.left: Left times to submit the article on this stage
articleCreation.name: Name
articleCreation.descriptionMust: Description must be more than 500 symbols
articleCreation.keywordsMust: Key words must be 3 symbols minimal
articleCreation.fileMust: The file must be in pdf format and lower than 10 Mb
articleList.sorry: Sorry, currently there are no available articles.
signup.fieldMust: The field must be at least 3 characters long
signup.usernameExists: This username already exists or you use forbidden symbol @
requirements.payAttP1: To submit an article you need to be signed up on the site
requirements.payAttP2: The article by itself must not contain any mentioning about authors' names, another way the article will be rejected
requirements.payAttP3: There is 2 stages, when your article can be sent to rework: 1. By editor, 2.By reviewer
requirements.payAttP4: It's possible just submit the article 3 times per each of the stages mentioned above, another way it will be rejected
requirements.payAttP5: If the article contains more than 15 percent of plagiarism, it will be rejected
requirements.rulesItem1: The volume of the completed article must be at least 3 pages of A4 format (including sources list) and no more than 15 pages of A4 format (including sources list)
requirements.rulesItem2: The font for typing, formulas, and tables in Microsoft Word for Windows are
requirements.rulesItem3: The title must be written in the language of original in capital letters, center-aligned: THE TITLE OF THE ARTICLE
requirements.rulesItem4: The title is given in English: the same information is repeated in English
requirements.rulesItem5: Annotation is in the original language and in English and it is not more than 300 characters (with spaces) for annotations in each language
requirements.rulesItem6: Keywords (given in the original and in English languages) are separated by a semicolon
requirements.rulesItem2Subitem1: Parameters of the text editor: all fields are 2 cm
requirements.rulesItem2Subitem2: Font is Times New Roman, 14 pt
requirements.rulesItem2Subitem7: All illustrations and tables should be numbered and provided with names under them
requirements.rulesItem2Subitem10: The article must be in .pdf format
